file.name: custom-rules-simple.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.1.0
paths:
  /NO_KEBAB/keb-ab/NOKEB2_NO:
    get:
      operationId: nokebab
  /keb-ab:
    get:
      operationId: kebab      
components:
  schemas:
    User:
      type: object
      properties:
        UPPERCASE:
          type: integer
        camelCase:
          type: integer          
  parameters:
    foo:
      in: query
      name: NonCAMEL
    foos:
      in: query
      name: camelCase      
    bar:
      name: NonCAMEL
      in: cookie

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: parameters: "bar": parameter MUST contain either a schema property, or a content property
